website_summaries.verdict: Because of its rich and long history, it seems that the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star has already exhausted all its potential. The leather upper of the shoe provides a style and feature upgrade making the sneaker tougher but more luxurious. The low-top profile is not only favored by many, but its familiar silhouette also creates a feeling of nostalgia for Converse fans.
pros: Several of the online reviewers note that these suit different age ranges
A couple of the commenters were surprised that despite the leather upper, it is lightweight
A high number of testers like the style of the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Leather Low Top
It is a traditional sneaker with a bit of edge
The leather, according to many, is nice, soft, and high quality, and gives a nice touch of panache on an outfit because of its sleek and sharp look
One user even used this for his wedding
The purchase is worth every penny, according to some of the buyers
Many of the shoppers note that, like most of the Converse sneakers, it is versatile and adds a bit of spunk to almost any article of clothing—jeans, shorts, and trousers
Compared to regular Chuck Taylors, these feel more comfortable
A few of the commenters are impressed with the thick insole as it makes the sneaker more comfortable
The leather upper is easy to maintain and clean as mentioned by a handful of consumers
The Chuck Taylor Leather Low Top can accommodate orthotics without making the feet look big, according to one tester
One user noted that although they are flat, the rubber sole allows the feet to bend correctly with every step, similar to walking barefoot
Despite a lifestyle sneaker, one who used this for weight training commended the shoe
cons: A high number of users feel disappointed that the sidewalls fall apart after a few months of use
A couple agreed that the shoes are not as sturdy despite looking durable
For those looking for supportive shoes, these are not recommended
One user wishes that the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Leather Low Top has a color selection that is as wide as the canvas ones

customer_reviews.title: Great for work!
customer_reviews.text: Took ages to arrive as Amazon kept changing the delivery date which was frustrating. However I am very happy with them. They are comfortable and appear good quality and have been great for work! ***** You are very welcome to ask any questions about my experience with this product. If you found this review helpful, please click on the “Yes” button below. *****
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: so far so good but time will tell, my daughter she is happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was ok in terms of price and delivery, but too large
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: These are a Christmas present, so not sure about the sizing yet. They look good only thing is they came in a plain box and not a converse box?. Not sure why, but they look great, hopefully my son will say the same.
customer_reviews.author: martine king

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Look good and feel great. I have to wear black shoes at work and these are perfect. Also they are suitable for those of us who have wider feet. I guess they are pricey but I spend a lot of time on my feet and I need comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Black Cat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They were a Birthday present for my daughter and she loves them 😍
customer_reviews.author: Susan Henry-McMullan

customer_reviews.title: Narrow. Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have western feet. The shoes are designed and made by people with miniature eastern feet. Despite getting a size larger than I normally need, these fit OK in length but are narrow. Not very comfortabale to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Leather Converse
customer_reviews.text: Love these converse and they were perfect for my daughter going back to school.. Thanks. X
customer_reviews.author: angela gibson

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek, low top, fit perfect pair of sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pure black, leatherette style. Very simple, but very nice at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Sven

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I wanted very happy with these and very quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Sides of seal have already cracked open at the seal. Please advise on your returns procedure as I can't find any contact details thanks
customer_reviews.author: nick
